sentences.sentence: You must do the things today that others will not do so that you can have the things tomorrow that others will not have.
sentences.translation: 你今天必需做别人不愿做的事，好让你明天可以拥有别人不能拥有的东西。

sentences.sentence: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
sentences.translation: 善良是一种语言，失聪者能听到，目盲者能看到。

sentences.sentence: Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
sentences.translation: 岁月留痕，只及肌肤；激情不再，皱起心灵。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes we have to go deep inside ourselves to solve our problems.
sentences.translation: 明确自己的内心所求，才能更好地解决问题。

sentences.sentence: There are nowadays professors of philosophy, but not philosophers.
sentences.translation: 近来哲学教授为数不少，但都称不上哲学家。
